Greetings comrade, it's been so long I forgot how many times I've done it. But now I've already found my true self, the reason I'm still struggling to keep on living. A man can have many reasons for his actions--and I simply want to be free. I've tried countless times to rein in my lustsful side yet to no avail, then I thought, "If I can't change it, then why not accept it?". Thus, I am now prepared to leave behind my past for the brighter future. Make no mistake, a man must be unbridled and unyielding, if you want to do it, then do it, don't let regret get the better of you. It's been a pleasure being with you all throughout this journey and in this one of my proudest fap page I leave behind my legacy. Guava out.
